author: ETA PRIME
description:
2025 has been absolutely wild for x86 handheld gaming PCs.
We’ve got Ryzen AI Max+, Z1/Z2 Extreme, Lunar Lake, OLED screens, 80Wh batteries, and more handheld power than ever… but which ones are actually worth your money?
In this video I go over my top x86 handhelds of 2025, breaking down raw performance, ergonomics, screen quality, battery life, pricing, and overall fun factor. From monsters like the GPD Win 5 and MSI Claw 8 to value champs like the Steam Deck OLED and feature-packed beasts like the Legion Go 2, I’ll let you know which devices still make sense going into early 2026.
By the end, I’ll tell you which handheld is my personal favorite… and I’d love to know which one is yours in the comments!
⚠️ Note: This video only covers x86 handheld gaming PCs – no ARM/Android-only handhelds here. Windows or SteamOS out of the box doesn’t matter, as long as it’s x86.

ROG Xbox ally X: https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/DyEaj2
Legion Go 2: https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/554vmn
Legion Go
title: Best X86 Handheld Gaming PC of 2025! Our Top Picks
